title: Forward Protocol Launches Token Sale on Bullstarter Launchpad After Selling out in Seconds on Chaingpt Pad!
description: The Forward project is over the moon to announce our upcoming token sale event on Bullstarter, the launchpad platform of BullPerks. title: CES 2024 – Exploring Blockchain’s Role in Consumer Technology
description:
Given the blockchain industry’s broader focus on crypto, we often overlook the broader applications of blockchain technology. Yet, blockchain is quietly revolutionizing various consumer technology sectors with its potential to transform how we trade, work and play. At CES 2024, I participated in a panel titled, ‘Blockchain’s Impact on Consumer Technology,’ that aimed to shed […]

The post CES 2024 – Exploring Blockchain’s Role in Consumer Technology appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
